Title: India, Bangladesh to make joint documentary on 1971 war
Content: India and Bangladesh on Wednesday agreed to jointly produce a documentary on the 1971 war which led to independence for Bangladesh. The decision was taken after a meeting between Information and Broa
Author: Special Correspondent
